The Atlanta Falcons joined the NFL in 1965 as an expansion team.

articles.title: Lee High School star athlete drowns at Chewacla State Park - WSFA
articles.description: A Montgomery teen drowned in Auburn Wednesday afternoon, according to police.
articles.content:
AUBURN, Ala. (WSFA) - A Montgomery teen drowned in Auburn Wednesday afternoon, according to police.
